Sentece: Twenty-five patients taking phenytoin (PHT) and/ or phenobarbital (PB) and/or primidone (PRM) underwent a rapid switchover to CBZ following a 10 mg/kg single-dose kinetic study (day 1) which allowed calculation of a maintenance dose necessary to yield a mean Css of 10.2 (+/-2.2) mg/l.
Title: Rapid switchover to carbamazepine using pharmacokinetic parameters.
Name: Primidone

Sentece: All patients completed the switchover to CBZ within a mean time period of 6 days (+/-2), reaching a mean maintenance dose of 1,639 mg/day (+/-370) which yielded a mean Css of 11.3 (+/-3.2) mg/l.
Title: Rapid switchover to carbamazepine using pharmacokinetic parameters.
Name: Primidone
